categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: The Four Masters, also known as the Four Founders, were the four Jedi Masters who founded the Jedi Temple on Coruscant one thousand years before the Clone Wars. Sculptures of the founders were carved into massive pylons which were displayed at the formal entrance to the Temple. Before the entrance was the ceremonial staircase of the Processional Way, atop of which were the statues of two Warrior Masters and two Sage Masters, which bore a resemblence to the Four Masters' sculptures.
